definitions.definition: The front opening of a creature through which food is ingested .
examples: "Open your mouth and say 'aah'," directed the doctor.

definitions.definition: The end of a river out of which water flows into a sea or other large body of water; or the end of a tributary out of which water flows into a larger river.
examples: The mouth of the river is a good place to go birdwatching in spring and autumn.

definitions.definition: A loud or overly talkative person.
examples: My kid sister is a real mouth ; she never shuts up.

definitions.definition: The crosspiece of a bridle bit , which enters the mouth of an animal.
A principal speaker ; one who utters the common opinion; a mouthpiece .
A wry face; a grimace; a mow.

main_definition: ( anatomy ) The front opening of a creature through which food is ingested .
secondary_definitions: The end of a river out of which water flows into a sea or other large body of water; or the end of a tributary out of which water flows into a larger river.
( slang ) A loud or overly talkative person.
( saddlery ) The crosspiece of a bridle bit , which enters the mouth of an animal.
( obsolete ) A principal speaker ; one who utters the common opinion; a mouthpiece .
( obsolete ) A wry face; a grimace; a mow.
